thread.title: 'Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XII' To Get December Release On PC
thread.title_full: 'Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XII' To Get December Release On PC

title: 'Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XII' To Get December Release On PC
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
It now seems that the PC release of Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII will be getting a release sometime this December....
